BookTitle: Journey to the Heart of the Lotus
ShortAbstract: Reflecting Ajahn Brahm’s unique way of teaching, the image of the lotus gradually unfolding is used as he shows us, chapter by chapter, how we too can discover the joy and happiness of meditation as taught by the Buddha.

BackMatter:
Discover the magic of kindfulness with Journey to the Heart of the Lotus, a guide to peace and insight based on the teachings of Ajahn Brahm on his 2023 Easter retreat at Jhana Grove.

Each chapter will take you deeper into the art of letting go, calming the mind and embracing the present moment.

Whether you're a seasoned meditator or just beginning your practice, a path to the radiant joy of stillness and true serenity awaits you within these pages.
